description:
For more information on DM crafting visit my website:
http://www.thedmscraft.com/

My Amazon affiliated link for the Carrots: https://amzn.to/2GI27ms

Washers to use as the base (My amazon affiliated link): https://amzn.to/2GFdoDY

Learn to make prehistoric jungle tree models for all your miniature 28mm tabletop games such as Dungeons and Dragons and Pathfinder. This easy craft will save you valuable time, so you have more hours to play the games you love. The materials are also cheap and easy to obtain so this project won’t break your budget. Bring a few crafting supplies and sit down with DM Scotty to begin your DIY crafting adventure. You can find the tools you need at my website ( http://www.thedmscraft.com/ ). So grab your gluegun and Go Forth and Craft.

Become a friend to the Craft and help me bring more content to the community by joining my Patreon. You will have access to exclusive DM Scotty content:  https://www.patreon.com/theDMsCraft?ty=h

Join The Tabletop Crafters Guild Facebook group for more crafts and camaraderie. 
https://www.facebook.com/groups/dmscottyscraftsngames/

Twitter: @TheDMsCraft
title: Craft Prehistoric Dinosaur Jungle Trees for your Tabletop Games (DM’s Craft #190)
